title: Bullet Force

headings.text: Complete Guide on How To Play Bullet Force

controls: WASD to moveSpacebar to jumpMouse to shootShift to runP to pause the gameEnter to respawnG to throw a grenadeE to pick up a gunF to use a knifeR to reload your weaponC to crouch2 to change your weaponArrow keys for killstreaksTab key for the score
content.howToPlay:
Bullet Force game is for those who can survive the intense action of shooting. Customize your character and be ready to join the battles. The opponents are pretty fast, but with sound equipment and weapons, you will handle them.

You can play multiplayer with other players worldwide, practice against bots, and improve your skills.
content.developer: Bullet Force was created by Blayze Games.

fullContent: Home› ShootingBullet ForceBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenComplete Guide on How To Play Bullet ForceBullet Force game is for those who can survive the intense action of shooting. Customize your character and be ready to join the battles. The opponents are pretty fast, but with sound equipment and weapons, you will handle them. You can play multiplayer with other players worldwide, practice against bots, and improve your skills.How to Start Shooting Battles?You have 4 possibilities to start a  shooting battleJoin Match: Join an existing room.Create Match: Name the room/match, choose the maximum players (14), maximum ping (1000 MS) and the type of battle.Offline & TutorialYou can select the region you like to be part of: US/CA, EUROPE 1, ASIA, SOUTH AMERICA.Bullet Force Display (HUD)Map (displayed on the top left)Leading team (shown on the top center)Weapon & ammo (shown on the top right)Game ModesBullet Force is a thrilling FPS game featuring 4 different game modes:Team DeathmatchFree For AllGun GameConquestProfile SectionYou will find your character's stats, weapons stats, leaderboard, season and rewards in this section.Customize SectionIn the Customize section, you will find details about the weapons, players, and other items that are valuable to becoming a good shooter.Primary WeaponsFor every weapon, the level of damage, accuracy, hip fire, stability, laser sights and range will be presented.Assault RiflesM4A1FAMAS (available to buy with 15,000 credits)AK-12 (available to buy with 30,000 credits)SCAR-H (available to buy with 60,000 credits)AUG (available to buy with 120,000 credits)AS VAL Force was created by Blayze Games.Similar to Bullet ForceIf you enjoy shooting games like Bullet Force, you should definitely play Guerillas io, where you are an elite team member and are called into battle on maps inspired by CS:GO. Our multiplayer FPS game collection comes with various options. Take a look at the FPS Games page to find the one that best suits you.This article was updated on June 8, 20253DActionArmorBattleBattle RoyaleFirst Person ShooterFreeGunMultiplayerShootingWarWeapon
